name: American Eagle Full Flight from Raleigh-Durham (RDU) to Washington (DCA) - Landmark-Filled Approach!
description:
Welcome to this Full Flight Experience aboard an American Eagle Embraer 175 from Raleigh-Durham International Airport to Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport!

After collecting the footage I needed for my tours so far on this trip, I had to connect to Washington, DC, and there's no better way, in my opinion, than DCA, a conveniently-located, manageable airport just outside the heart of the capitol. While the flight was delayed, the service itself was excellent, and the views were awesome!

This flight takes us from central North Carolina just one state up to the edge of the District of Columbia and Virginia, complete with great views of the airfield from above, the National Mall, and many landmarks as we make the famous Potomac River approach from the north into DCA. My thanks to the crew who, despite the delay, conducted the flight beautifully!

Thanks for flying with me, and enjoy the ride!

Video Timeline
00:00 - Intro
01:10 – Boarding 
01:45 – Pushback
02:20 – Buyer's Remorse
02:45 – Taxi and Captain's Announcement
03:55 – Takeoff
06:00 – Beverage Service
06:30 – Flyover of DCA and National Mall
09:15 – Ground Delays and Personal Anguish
10:45 – Gate Arrival

#aviation #travel #raleigh #rdu #dca #reagan #americanairlines #embraer #embraer170 #washingtondc 

__________________________________________________________________________________

Flight Information

Airline: Republic Airways o/a American Eagle

Flight Number: AA 4736

Date of Flight: Monday, June 28th, 2021

Origin Airport: Raleigh-Durham International Airport (KRDU/RDU)

Destination Airport: Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport (KDCA/DCA)


Departing Gate: C25

Boarding Time: 12:42 EDT

Scheduled Departure: 12:20 EDT (after delay)

Actual Departure from Gate: 12:54 EDT

Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 5L / 13:10 EDT

Landing Runway and Time: RWY 19 / 13:55 EDT

Scheduled Arrival: 13:25 EDT (after delay)

Actual Arrival at Gate: 14:25 EDT

Arriving Gate: 52


Total Flight Time: 45 minutes

Total Gate-to-Gate: 1 hour, 31 minutes

Distance between Airports: 227 mi/365 km

Aircraft Information

Type: Embraer E175
